thread.title: Should your community allow medical marijuana-related businesses in? Tell us what you think
thread.title_full: Should your community allow medical marijuana-related businesses in? Tell us what you think

author: Linda Kinsey, cleveland.com
title: Should your community allow medical marijuana-related businesses in? Tell us what you think
text: Parma is one of the latest communities to express interest in luring the marijuana industry into its town. How do you feel about that? Tells us in the box below.
